stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild was baffled by a new magical phenomenon. When they pulsed arcane energy into a special crystal, it was supposed to get hotter and wilder. Instead, the crystal surprisingly stayed cool, its magical motes settling into a calm, steady dance, thanks to an unknown deep magical principle.

stories.fantasy_headline: Swift Training Wards Off Dark Blight!
stories.fantasy_story: Healers have uncovered a surprising secret about battling the creeping blight. Even a short burst of vigorous physical training, perhaps a quick sword dance or sprint, releases powerful vital essences into the body. These essences mend the body's life scrolls and silence the dark blight's whispers, offering a new way to protect the kingdom's folk.

stories.original_headline: The gap between premium and budget TV brands is quickly closing
stories.original_summary: For all the time that I've been covering technology, there's been a hierarchy when it comes to TV brands. The big three - Sony, Samsung, and LG - have been on top for a while. Pioneer and Panasonic were up there with plasma TVs, and Panasonic is getting back in the game in the States. […]
stories.fantasy_headline: Common Scrying Mirrors Rival Grandest Artifacts!
stories.fantasy_story: For many years, the Grand Guilds like Sony's Scryers and Samsung's Seers held dominion over the finest viewing crystals. Now, however, the crafters of common scrying mirrors are enchanted with new techniques. Their more affordable artifacts are beginning to show visions as clear and bright as the grandest, making magic more accessible to all.
